derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 18th cent.: from German Deckel, diminutive of Decke 'covering'

means.word_mean: 1. rough edge left by a deckle on handmade paper or produced artificially on machine-made paper
2. (paper making) a frame used to form paper pulp into sheets
